rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Primary entity representing the collection of all opera characters. These are the agents in opera that are usually played by opera singers.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Opera Character

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A virtual property linking an opera character to information about the opera in which the character appears and the voice that the character has.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Operas

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A virtual property linking an opera character to information about who played the character and in what productions.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Portrayed by

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A type that collects information about the kind of voice, e.g. alto or soprano, of a character in an opera.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Opera Character Voice

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the character in the opera.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Character

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the given opera.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Opera

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the voice or vocal range of the character, e.g. baritone or soprano.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Voice

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Primary entity representing the collection of all opera companies. These are the companies that put together productions of operas.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Opera Company

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A virtual property linking an opera company to a production done by the opera company.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Operas Produced

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Primary entity representing the collection of all opera stage designers. Stage designers are the people responsible for putting together the scenic design of the opera production.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Opera Designer

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A virtual property linking an opera stage designer to information about the opera productions on which the designer has worked.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Operas Designed
rdf:Description.mso:type.property.deprecation_info: If this property is needed, it should be added to theater.designer. DeprecatedBy:[REDMOND\ianiles]

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A type containing standard descriptors for the kinds of roles that opera stage designers can have in an opera production.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Opera Designer Role

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A virtual property linking an opera designer role to information about opera stage designers who have held the role.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Designers
operas_directed
rdf:Description.mso:type.property.deprecation_info: If this property is needed, it should be added to theater.director. DeprecatedBy:[REDMOND\ianiles]

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A type containing standard descriptors for kinds of operas, e.g. Peking opera, Savoy opera, and Singspiel.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Opera Genre

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A virtual property linking an opera genre to an opera that exemplifies the genre.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Operas

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Primary entity representing the collection of all opera houses. Opera houses are the theater buildings created for opera performances. They consists of a stage, an orchestra pit, audience seating, and backstage facilities for costumes and set building. Some opera houses are part of larger performing arts centers.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Opera House

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Primary entity representing the collection of all librettists. These are the individuals responsible for the text, also known as the libretto, of the opera.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Librettist

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A virtual property linking an opera librettist to a libretto that he or she wrote. Note that the expected type of this property should eventually be changed to opera.libretto.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Libretti

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Primary entity representing the collection of all opera libretti, i.e. texts containing the words and the stage directions for an opera.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Opera Libretto

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Primary entity representing the collection of all operas. Opera is an art form in which singers and musicians perform a dramatic work combining text (called a libretto) and musical score, usually in a theatrical setting.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Opera

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A virtual property that relates an opera to information about the actors and the characters that they play in the opera.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: characters

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates an opera to a standard descriptor for a genre that the opera exemplifies.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Genre

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that links an opera to the person who wrote the libretto for the opera.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Librettist

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates an opera to the first production of the opera.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Premiere Production

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A virtual property that relates an opera to a production of the opera.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Productions

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates an opera to a soundtrack for the opera.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Recording

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A person who secures the financial backing and hires the creative personnel for an opera production.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Opera Producer

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A virtual property that relates an opera producer to an opera that he or she produced.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Operas Produced

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Primary entity representing the collection of all opera productions. Productions are the actual stage performances of a given opera.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Opera Production

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates an opera production to the corresponding opera.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Opera

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates an opera production to the opera house where it was performed.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Performed at
